name: Ancient Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon
text: This card can only be summoned by using the effect of "Ancient Power Released", this cards summoning can not be negated. Once per turn (quick effect): you can discard 1 inferno fire blast or 1 Anciant Inferno Fire Blast from your hand if you do inflict damage to your opponant equal to this cards original ATK. This card is unaffected by card effects. Once per turn on either players turn you can target 1 monster your opponent controls and destroy it and if you do your opponent takes damage equal to that monsters ATK. Once per turn during either players turn (quick effect), if your opponant activates a card or effect you can discard a card from your hand then if you do negate the activation and distroy that card and if you do that this card gains 1000 ATK and DEF. This card cannot be attacked by Wyrms, Dragons or Spellcaster Type Monsters and Once Per Turn During Either Player's Turn Quick Effect you can target 1 Wyrm, Dragon or Spellcaster Monster your Opponent controls and if you do you can equip it to this card and this cards original ATK is increased by the ATK of that equiped monster. If this card in its owners control leaves the field at the End Phase you can banish all cards Your Opponent controls and if you do Special Sommon 1 Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon from your Extra Deck and/or GY in ATK Position. Your opponent can not activate cards or effects in response to any of this cards effects.
